model
Class ScoreValidator

java.lang.Object
  model.ScoreValidator

public class ScoreValidator
extends java.lang.Object

The ScoreValidator class validates and scores hands for a Yahtzee dice game. The ScoreValidator implements the Singleton design pattern in order to achieve an abstract final (static) top level class.

Version:
2.0.1 2/6/2012
Author:
Aaron Lamb
